nodes.text: Mosolium was a male Trandoshan who lived during the Galactic Civil War.

Mosolium was a non-player character in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. He was added to the game with the release of the 2005 expansion pack, Rage of the Wookiees. He was originally named Musolium, but the name was later changed to Mosolium for unknown reasons.
